title: Imposter: The Man Who Came Back from the Dead
overview: Series telling the story of a man in a Glasgow hospital who awoke from a Covid coma to discover that the police had identified him as a fugitive from justice and one of America's most wanted criminals. He maintained that this was a case of mistaken identity - but was he an extraordinary criminal, constantly changing his name and identity, or a wronged innocent thrown into a limelight he did not deserve?
